name: Gazing from beyond
description: This is a galgame about college life, where you'll pursuit the love of your life. You'll surely experience hardship, triumph, happiness, sadness, maybe even trauma. Only time can heal all.
minimum_requirements: OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 Processor: Intel Core2DUO 1.2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX9.0 VRAM128MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space
